text: Shinkot () (also Pasaband) is a town and the center of Pasaband District, in the southern part of Ghor Province, Afghanistan. It is located in the western part of the district at at 2,566 m altitude, and is close to the border with Helmand Province. ==References== ==See also== *Ghōr Province Category:Populated places in Ghor Province
title: Shinkot
